attributes.review: This app is so bad it took more than 4 days to download and then it hacked all of my social media and personal information do now download it had leaked a lot of my photos and private information do not download this app I’m warning you
attributes.title: Terrible app 🙁

attributes.review: My plant Frederick was THE number 1 Trump Support. He bought all of his merchandise and always wore it around the house. When I showed him this app he was sadden by how much fake news there was :( Frederick doesn’t even wanna go out in the sun no more :’( He does not recommend this app to anyone >:( FREDERICK SAYS NO !!!
attributes.title: FAKE NEWS

attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hopes to support my president and was highly disappointed in what the app had to offer. Nothing was in regards to what was supposed to be shown and it displayed very negatives things on different ethnicities. I can’t believe Apple put this app out!!!
attributes.title: Horrible app!!!!

attributes.review: as i downloaded my app it occurred to me that i hadn’t fed my dog, so i went to feed my dog after i walked my closet but my closet had water in it because of the cactus. the dog decided to go and get a four for four at walmart, and the four for four was poisoned so we went to chick fil a to get a big mac, but i needed to check on the dog, and when i went to check on him my phone was opened to the app which made my phone burn up, and it exploded my dog! 0/10 would not recommend.
attributes.title: this app murdered my family dog

attributes.review: This app was the worst thing I’ve experienced. I opened the app and it wouldn’t load for one 37 minutes. Once it finally loads a saw a naked picture of president trump. I was appalled ghat our PRESIDENT thought that would be okay. This app is an embarrassment
attributes.title: If I could leave no stars I would

attributes.review: This all was horrendous. It kept asking for private information and used up all my space. I think it hacked into my other apps and tried to take my information. What a disgusting invasion of privacy. I expected better.
attributes.title: What a scam

attributes.review: This app is full of fake news and narcissism.  Ugly people patting each other on the back for hateful things.  They are so full of crap, but they love it. Promote crap. Sell crap. Just a terrible, shameful app. Hate apps that just want, want, want but have nothing to give. Don’t get this app.
